amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds in furtherance of the "Public Charge Ground of Inadmissibility" rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
